channel.title: CVE Feed for N-MEDIA -- Personalized WooCommerce Cart Page
channel.description: The latest CVEs for N-MEDIA -- Personalized WooCommerce Cart Page

item.title: CVE-2019-5979|2024-08-04T20:09:23.948Z -- n-media -- personalized%20woocommerce%20cart%20page
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Personalized WooCommerce Cart Page 2.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.
